title: Add more currencies
comment: This app is almost almost there, it just needs more currency options and its 5 stars!

title: Gets the job done simply
comment: Way better than Splitwise

title: Just perfect
comment: Only thing missing is syncing/backing up to your Google account. In case you lose your device.

title: Best and most intuitive app.
comment: This app is so user friendly and has everything that you would need at the right places... One the best app in this category.

title: Great, simple, and beautiful
comment: The best and easiest to use IOU app I've used.  Highly recommended.
Thanks for you feedback and for pointing this out, I'll get it changed very soon :)

title: Doesn't show contact photos
comment: Photos is just the color icon.. Contact photos are missing.

title: Doesn't work on kit kat
comment: Update* app no longer works on kit Kat devices. Just freezes.    I tested at least 5 different IOU apps and this is the clear winner. Not only is the user interface wonderfully simplistic but also completely intuitive and functional. Extremely easy to keep up with who owes you money with this app.

title: Awesome app
comment: This is exactly what I was looking for. Hope it gets better and better with every update. Good job.

title: Really useful to keep track of IOU
comment: Would be useful to have some cloud saving features and a way of linking debts between Repay users, so that it is synced (ie: debt paid notifications, etc)

title: Easy and simple.
comment: It just works.

title: Nice app, beautiful UI
comment: Finally a nice and beautiful way of keeping track of tabs among friends

title: Simple and effective
comment: Quite simple to use, so it's easy to put an IOU in on the spot so you don't lost track of them. Already using it and finding it much easier to manage who owes who money. Ability to set own currency would be great.

title: Lovin it! Suggestion!
comment: If cloud syncing would be included and an editable currency, that would definitely be a 5star!

title: Nice interface
comment: Love the look and simplicity of transaction entry. A good feature would be to allow partial repayments and also ability to edit entries rather than delete/start again.

I'm working the edit ability into the next version. As for doing partial repayments, I'll work on finding an intuitive way of doing it but originally I intended people to use the Add Debt method. Thanks for the feedback :)

title: Hi Matt
comment: Willies

title: Does what it says
comment: Excellent little app, does exactly what it says. Maybe I would change the green/red list items with icons (might look better) but so far it works fine.
I have now added the option to use icons instead of colouring the list item. Thanks for the feedback.

title: Looks and works great
comment: This app is simple and incredibly good looking. It's a great looking app that follows the design guidelines really well. It's also incredibly simple to use and solves a problem that I face all the time. I also very much like the ability to get names from my contacts. Saves me a few keystrokes!  I'd like to see the ability to edit debts added. That's the only feature holding this app back from being 5 stars.
